titleStmt.title: The relation of His Majestie's entertainment passing through the city of London, to his coronation: with a description of the triumphal arches, and solemnity; by John Ogilby.
titleStmt.author: Ogilby, John, 1600-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Tho. Roycroft, for Rich. Marriott, in St Dunstan's Church-Yard in Fleet-Street,
